name: What's On Your Mind?
description:
The following are real responses from university students to the question, "What's On Your Mind?"

Answer the question for yourself by speaking into your microphone to interact with the environment. 

If you're a university student, and want your response added to the game, you can check out this google form: https://forms.gle/8g35nRwnxxw9uwCcA

Special thanks to Lauren Falvo for the walking animations, and to Pixabay (https://pixabay.com/) for the background music. Lauren's work can be found at https://www.instagram.com/lauren.falvo/?hl=en

Disclaimer! This is still being updated - bugs are present. Most notably, the microphone levels are tuned to be appropriate for my microphone - they may be too sensitive or not sensitive enough to register your input. Make sure you allow the application to access your mic, and make sure its using the right mic - but if all else fails, its safe to assume its a bug. Promise I'm getting there! 

Issues loading within Itch? You can download the game files and check out the source code here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1HOci0liDoF9luOyF2QSJFM9O3Fd2kgBY?usp=sha...

& as always THANK YOU for engaging with the things I make. 

-J
